991010.name: NAIRI: Tower of Shirin - OST
991010.description:
This eclectic, catchy and soulful collection of music composed by Joshua van Kuilenburg will transport you once again to the fantastical world of Shirin. With an extensive score of 29 tracks in total, this collects everything from snippets to full pieces, making it a must for anyone looking to relive the NAIRI: Tower of Shirin experience.

TRACK LIST:
01. HomeBearStudio (0:12)
02. Main Menu (0:32)
03. Prelude (0:50)
04. A Tense Situation (0:53)
05. Fredrick (0:32)
06. Title Reveal (0:18)
07. Cats' Hideout (1:30)
08. Away From Home (2:09)
09. Goodbye (0:11)
10. Poor District, Night (2:50)
11. The Wild Duck (1:02)
12. Entering the Dark (0:08)
13. Beneath the Tower (2:57)
14. A Vision (1:18)
15. Harp Tune (0:06)
16. Mother's Song (0:18)
17. A Dark Presence (2:14)
18. Childhood (2:56)
19. The Escape (0:32)
20. Finding Shiro (0:34)
21. Poor District, Day (2:52)
22. VIP Club (1:16)
23. Shiro's Lament (0:25)
24. Zakat District (1:54)
25. The White Mask (0:59)
26. Atop the Tower (0:56)
27. Sanctum of Noora (10:14)
28. The Fall (0:50)
29. Credits (2:16)
Total Run-time: (43:44)

All files are presented in WAV and MP3 formats and can be found in the game's installation directory.
991010.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
